Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in the entire event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences across all cases
Percentage of variants that include SW-Awaiting AE Assignment immediately after SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Number of times SW-Awaiting AE Assignment is followed by SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment compared to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Awaiting AE Assignment appears without being preceded by SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases where 'SW-Checklist Completed' does not happen

Name: Number of variants in which SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurs exactly once
Metric: the sum of the function base == 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment events that are part of the top 5 most frequent process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment relative to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases transitioning from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-AE Assign Reviewers within 7 days
Metric: the average of the function base < 7 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment instances that occur before any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not occur

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences that are not followed by any AE assignment activity within 30 days
Metric: the average of the function base > 30 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` != 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in rejected manuscripts (those ending with SW-EIC Reject or SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment events that appear in variants with performance duration above the median variant duration
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' out of all cases
